description: This file defines the CartAdapter class, a RecyclerView adapter for displaying shopping cart items in an Android app. It manages the presentation of cart lines, including item details, options, and quantity controls, and provides callback hooks for user interactions such as incrementing, decrementing, removing, or editing cart items.

classes.name: CartAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying cart items, handling item comparison, and user interactions.

classes.name: CartAdapter.VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class for cart item views, holding references to UI elements for each cart line.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: Inner object implementing DiffUtil.ItemCallback to optimize list updates by comparing cart line items.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and initializes ViewHolder instances by inflating the item layout.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds cart line data to UI elements in the ViewHolder, setting up display and interaction handling.
